main.name: Isaac Tin
main.description: deeply invested into learning the relavant as well as new technologies of software engineering
main.bio: I am a Year 2 undergraduate who is interested in both the frontend and backend technologies. I've always thought that while the school teaches us useful skills and technologies, they do not provide a sufficient number of opportunities to put the knowledge and skills into practical usage, and hence I am eager to apply the skills and knowledge I have into new and interesting projects and software.

education.description: Cum. GPA: 4.17/5.00 (Second Class Honours, Upper Division)
Five distinctions in GCE A Levels with a score of 87.5/90 (Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Economics, Project Work).

work.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
work.description: Coordinated with higher-ups in the setting up and configuring of various softwares for the company such as BigBlueButton, Odoo, nextcloud. Assisted seniors with debugging and problem-solving in HTML, CSS and Javascript.

work.title: Temporary Admin Staff
work.description: Coordinated communication between town residents and property officers and property managers, ensuring smooth and efficient flow of information between the two parties

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
